text: Convicted Woman is a 1940 American crime movie directed by Nick Grinde and starring Glenn Ford, Rochelle Hudson, Frieda Inescort, June Lang, Lorna Gray, Iris Meredith, Esther Dale. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1940 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies directed by Nick Grinde Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Convicted Woman
